thanks.text: Alternatively, you can contact us using the links below

main.title: Rent karaoke for any event
main.text: We offer professional karaoke sets for any event: from home parties and corporate events to weddings and anniversaries. You will find karaoke sets that meet your needs and budget.

cards.title: Mobility
cards.text: Mobility - we will bring and install the karaoke system to any point in Europe.

cards.title: Wide selection
cards.text: Over 100,000 foreign and domestic songs for every taste.

cards.title: Quality
cards.text: A sound engineer will set up the equipment and monitor its operation.

feedback.title: Contact us
feedback.text: Leave a request and we will contact you ourselves, tell and explain what to do next.

third.title: Date
third.placeholder: Select the date of the event

fourth.title: Message
fourth.placeholder: Ask a question or specify details of the future order

feedback.confirm: By submitting this form, you consent to the processing of personal data.

texts.first: We are a team of people who are obsessed with quality sound. For 15 years we have been providing technical support for events: sound and lighting installation, selection of DJs and musicians. We organize karaoke parties not only in Prague, but also all over the Czech Republic and Europe.
texts.second: We believe that music is a key part of any celebration. Our goal is to make sure that your party has the right atmosphere and that your guests enjoy themselves to the fullest. That's why we work with the leading artists, musicians, sound engineers, lighting technicians and other event professionals in Europe. We guarantee the quality of our professionals' work and strive to meet all your requirements.

cards.title: Karaoke system with video display
cards.text: Instead of just displaying the lyrics on the screen, we offer a karaoke system with a video display that shows clips or animations corresponding to the song. This allows users to enjoy a more entertaining and interactive experience, helping them to better enjoy karaoke parties and delivering a true musical performance experience

cards.title: Large screens for the ultimate experience: 50 inch LED TV up to 3x5m large LED screen
cards.text: We have a 55 inch TV screen and up to a 3x5 meter large LED screen, which make it convenient to display the lyrics of the songs for all participants. The large screen also makes it easier for people with low vision to read the lyrics.

cards.title: Song catalogue - over 100,000 hits
cards.text: More than 100,000 hits in the song catalogue in different languages (ENG, CZ, SK, PL, RU, UKR, IT, ES, DE and more ) offer a huge selection of music for karaoke performances. Thanks to this wide range of songs, the preferences of all participants, who may have different musical preferences and interests, can be satisfied.

cards.title: Up to 5 wireless microphones with good sound quality for karaoke parties
cards.text: We use only the best brands Shure, Sennheiser , JBL and more which are great choices for karaoke parties Microphones with cardioid routing and excellent sound quality. It's a great choice for karaoke parties because the microphones have excellent sensitivity and are easy to use.

cards.title: Delivery - we can install anywhere in Europe
cards.text: Shipping and installation on our part provide the ultimate convenience for customers, who can be assured that the equipment will be delivered and installed at the venue without having to spend time and effort organising and setting up the audio equipment. We'll arrange everything and your event will run smoothly and without a hitch. Additionally, should there be any issues with the equipment during the event, our technicians are on hand to assist and resolve any issues that may arise.

cards.name: Home party
cards.text: This package is designed for home use. It includes the minimum components to host a karaoke party, including microphones, party lights, sound system and the ability to enjoy a karaoke party at home.

cards.name: Basic
cards.text: The basic package includes professional equipment to create a better atmosphere, including a sound technician and the option to use karaoke for a smaller number of people.

cards.name: Party
cards.text: In this offer we offer karaoke system rental with powerful sound and microphones for a large number of participants. In addition, DJ services are included, (possibility to play and party during breaks, songs on request, creating a better atmosphere for karaoke parties)

cards.name: Premium
cards.person: DJ and sound technician, lighting technician
cards.equipment: Large projection 3,5 m x 2 m + Led TV 50 inches, professional lighting of the stage and dance floor.
cards.text: The Premium Package is a luxury set-up for corporate parties or galas that transforms karaoke performances into a high-level show. It provides excellent sound and bright lighting that adds elegance and uniqueness to your party. Be the star of the night with our premium package.

cards.question: What types of sound equipment and karaoke are available for rent?
cards.answer: Professional equipment from Bose and Electro Voice. Karaoke systems from Your Day with a total database of over 100,000 songs (in English, Czech, Russian, Ukrainian, Italian, Spanish, French, German, and more).

cards.question: What are the costs and rental conditions for sound equipment and karaoke?
cards.answer: Prices start from 4,500 CZK. Conditions: application, delivery, payment via invoice after the event.

cards.question: What are the possibilities for delivery and installation of sound equipment and karaoke at an event?
cards.answer: Delivery of karaoke is available throughout the Czech Republic and Europe.

cards.question: What additional services and options are provided when renting sound equipment and karaoke?
cards.answer: Full technical support for the event (sound, lighting, multimedia).

cards.question: How long can sound equipment and karaoke be rented for?
cards.answer: Karaoke rental is available for a whole evening, several days, or for 24 hours.

cards.question: How is payment for the rental of sound equipment and karaoke made?
cards.answer: Payment for karaoke rental is made after the event. Cash and non-cash payments, invoice payment, and fakturační platba are all accepted.

cards.question: What are the conditions for canceling or changing an order for the rental of sound equipment and karaoke?
cards.answer: The conditions for canceling or changing an order for the rental of sound equipment and karaoke depend on the company and the agreement. Typically, there is a certain period before the start of the rental during which free cancellation or modification is allowed.

offer.text: We will develop a website for your business
